name: String Beans Vinaigrette
keywords: gluten-free, nut-free, vegetarian, green beans, parmesan, tomato, side dish
recipeIngredient: 1 pound green beans, washed, ends snipped off and sliced on the diagonal

recipeInstructions.text: Fill a large saucepan with water and bring to a boil. Add salt to taste and the beans. Cook until tender but still firm, about 4 minutes. Drain and set aside.
Place beans in a bowl with the remaining ingredients except the tomatoes and olives. Mix well and chill. Serve with the tomatoes and olives.
